body_html:
thanks for your ask,I runing tensorflow mobile_net on Raspberry Pi3 Raspbian OS according to the tutorial.I download tensorflow-1.5.0-cp35-none-linux_armv7l.whl and install tensorflow by pip.
I have a model that was trained in PC.And now I want to implement real-time prediction.but model prediction is very slow.
So I want to use the tensorflow distributed computing approach to speed up my model prediction.
But the problem is that I can't get relevant information about tensorflow distributed prediction.
If you can give me relevant information or demo I will be very grateful. Thanks

body:
thanks for your ask,I runing tensorflow mobile_net on Raspberry Pi3 Raspbian OS according to the tutorial.I download tensorflow-1.5.0-cp35-none-linux_armv7l.whl and install tensorflow by pip.
I have a model that was trained in PC.And now I want to implement real-time prediction.but model  prediction is very slow.
So I want to use the tensorflow distributed computing approach to speed up my model prediction.
But the problem is that I can't get relevant information about tensorflow distributed prediction.
If you can give me relevant information or demo I will be very grateful. Thanks
